data.title: Keyless Entry And Security Door Installation In Detroit
data.meta_description: Detroit's leading provider of commercial locksmith services from door installation to access controls like keyless entry & intercoms.

Based on 82 reviews

The Flying Locksmiths have been a great addition to our vendor list here at Rainbow Child Care Center. They are prompt, courteous, and very competitively priced. They have the ability to provide us with solutions right from their truck, and if the parts aren't available there is no lag in service waiting for the parts. I highly recommend them for anybody that needs service.

Anthony G.

The best locksmith I‚Äôve ever used

BK

Great company great people Rich and Selena are the best

David K.

We had been trying for months to get the electric key strike fixed and people quoted like we need a new building. But this crew came in in uniform professional and knowledgeable can I Say KnowledgeableInstalled in a week. My staff is so excited and I wanted to say thanks again for your great work.

Terry& June E.

Your technician that you sent was polite, friendly, informative, and very professional. I think your customers would enjoy the services he provided me.

Theodore K.

I have 3 doors keyed the same at my office building and one of them was no longer functioning properly. I was told by others that I'd have to replace all 3 cylinders and get new keys made for everyone. The Flying Locksmith took one look and simply fixed the damaged cylinder in minutes. They saved me hundreds of dollars and the hassle of distributing new keys to all my employees. I was very pleased with their professionalism, price, and responsiveness. I would definitely recommend them!

Steve D.

Mr Ray came out to Applegate Chevrolet to get our vault safe open for us. This safe is more than 70 yes old. He did get it open for us. Would highly recommend this company for any locksmith needs. Mr Ray was very helpful

Micki L.

Hired The Flying Locksmiths to replace a motorized panic bar that worked in conjunction with existing hotel lock hardware. They were professional and delivered exactly what I needed. Very happy with the service. We will be using this company again.

Joe S.

These gentlemen have serviced my business (Value City Furniture Utica) a few times now. They are very personable and efficient. They were able to perform great work in little time. Super helpful!!! Thank you.

Henry M.

Mark Heidel is professional, prompt, and enjoyable to work with. I would use him / The Flying locksmiths as my first resource for our lock needs

OldMan J.

Deployed a 2 lock system in one day. Had an issue with the control unit falling off the wall but they came right back out and fixed it. Dry wall screw was stripped out I believe.

Marc H.

Dave Losano did a fantastic job. Went above and beyond to ensure that we were happy with the results. VERY happy that we chose Flying Locksmith.

A J

They do great work and on time.

Area M.

I called the company and just asked from them to take a look at our security system as one of the doors wasn't unlocking correctly. Was expecting a quote and then I would arrange for an onsite repair. Little did I know that this guy was a master. He had the electronic lock mechanism pulled apart and repaired in a very short time frame. Professional, Experts, and didn't waste time. I would highly recommend

Howard F.

Our experience with The Flying Locksmith's in Phoenix has been fantastic and the experience we have had so far in Detroit has not disappointed. Mark and Rich were very professional and extremely helpful.

Sherman P.

Fast response time, affordable prices, and friendly staff. I won't be using anyone else!

Sammy J.

The workman was very polite and efficient in changing our locks and advising us as to what we need.

St. Paul Community Lutheran C.

Quick response, great work and gave us recommendations on taking better care of our locks. Definitely calling again if the need arises!

Donna P.

Dave and Kevin did a great job adding our 3rd Camera and updating the system.

Fred M.

Ray did a great job ! Thanks again üòÅ

Melody B.

Rich is great! Always on time and helps fix our door issues for our commercial building.

Paige W.

Friendly, Fast, Affordable, knowledgeable. Very happy I chose this company do to business with.

Luke 8.

Locksmith staff makes security easy. Very professional courteous and detail oriented. Works out of the box for solutions. Would highly recommend for any security need.

steven Y.

The Flying Locksmiths were extremely helpful. They worked on three doors for us, did a great job, and completed the work efficiently. We greatly appreciate their service!

DiHydro S.

Manny was an excellent technician. Service was professional and quick. He was very accommodating to the three dogs that were at our door to greet him.

Christopher M.

Highly recommended! Trustworthy and professional.

eric P.

The Flying Locksmiths of Detroit North are professional, timely, and helpful. There quote is always exactly what they charge so there are never any 'surprises'. Will continue to use them over and over!

Kristen S.

Dave is great. Always available to answer questions or when we need something. The Flying Locksmiths customer service is top notch.Hard Rock Stone Works

Traci M.

Quick service , professional , would use again

Manny R.

The entire Flying Locksmith team is not only professional, experienced & knowledgeable, their customer service is top notch and hard to beat! Mark and his team were diligent in helping us with all of our needs. The staff at The Flying Locksmiths would not rest until our project was complete and all parties were satisfied. Our team at Designhaus Architecture cannot recommend their services enough. Give them a call today!

Katelyn H.

We hired The Flying Locksmiths (Detroit North) to install a control access system on our building during the height of COVID. The owner (Mark) personally met with our company to provided details on what options were available so we could make an informed decision. We ended up taking Mark's advice and chose the OpenPath control access system. Mark submitted the order that day and we had Technicians here the following week when parts had arrived. The installation was quick and the Technicians were polite and professional. Mark then provided a comprehensive overview on how to operate the system and navigate the online interface.We have now had the system just under two years and we are beyond satisfied. While OpenPath has an excellent customer service group, we always know we can turn to Mark and his Team. That type of customer service is hard to find these days. Kaltz Excavating Co. Inc. highly recommends The Flying Lock Smiths (Detroit North) for all of your security needs!

Kevin H.

We highly recommend The Flying Locksmiths! They were so helpful and explained everything to us. Rick was amazing! We really appreciate how helpful they were and would use them again in a heartbeat!

Relevar H.

I've been trying to get door closers for my organizations for 18 months - all the other companies I contacted said it could not be done. The terrific folks at the Flying Locksmiths installed them today (and changed a lock too) and they work great! THANK YOU!

Paint Creek Center for the A.

The Flying Locksmiths are amazing! I am the property manager at The Landings of Fountain Pointe in Grand Blanc MI. We just used this company to install new locks on all 468 of our units and 37 buildings. The process went so smooth. I would highly recommend this company for anyone to use. Mark is absolutely incredible as is the rest of the team that I dealt with.

Angela P.

The Flying Locksmiths arrived on time, were always polite, and knew exactly what they were doing. I would recommend them to anyone that needs services done on their home or business.

Taylor S.

Fast, polite and professional, i will be using these guys moving forward

Charlie B.

I have used them multiple times. Won't use anybody else. Prompt care and extremely knowledgeable. I work in commercial building with numerous types of locks and they can fix it all. Price is good.

Keith D.

Worth every star. Ray could have easily just dropped off the keys but he came in and witnessed the keys ordered from the manufacturer worked. Professional, reliable, great communication every step of the way. Glad to have found them.

Sean F.

Since opening in 2019, Flying Locksmiths Detroit North has been fantastic....professional, prompt, and quality service! Highly Recommend!

Michael M.

Laura, the operations manager, and her field technicians did a super job responding to my new construction project in Birmingham. Very pleased with their communication and timeliness. I‚Äôm really happy I found them and will be using them again frequently.

Anne

I had a wonderful experience with the Flying Locksmiths. They came out shortly after I called. The gentleman was very nice and efficient. He was in and out in 10 minutes! Thank you Flying Locksmiths!

T G

Always Service with a Smile! We love working with the Flying Locksmiths!!

Jennifer R.

Rich was great!! got locks done quickly and professionally!

John D.

Very prompt response. Great job on locks!

Shelley T.

Very trustworthy and fast service by professionals!

Scott T.

Prompt service, very professional and courteous technician. A pleasure to work with.

Sue D

Great company to deal with, Rich, Ray, Dave and Sarena (yes, they have a female technician) did a great job for our company. Definitely going to use them again at our other locations.

Nunya B.

Such a great place to go get keys for if your in a pinch. I needed to get an extra key made for our office in a hurry, before a new staff member started. Mark & Karen were able to get it done quickly and were more than accommodating to my specific needs. Great turn around, great company, and great people!

Jesse C.

The Flying Locksmiths installed the door locks, panic system, and security system for our HOTWORX studio in a quick and professional manner. After time, when we ran into an issue with our door system, they sent our one of their techs, Ray, to fix the problem. He was clean and courteous even as we had clients coming in and out of the studio! Excellent work Flying Locksmiths!

Studio Fenton, M.

This is a great company to work with. Responsive, skilled, efficient, and reasonably priced. I recommend.

Technology D.

Mark and his team are great! Whenever we have questions there customer support team is available and they get someone out right away if necessary!

charles A.

Very quick to come out the gentleman that showed up was very professional and extremely nice. The woman that answered the phone and took my info very quick to get a response from the tech they are amazing.

Mike S.

Very nice people to work with, Very prompt in getting services completed at a reasonable price.

Gabrielle D.

I work for 2Gather Elegant Event Venue and we have used Mark and his team at The Flying Locksmiths multiple times. Response time means everything when you need a locksmith and The Flying Locksmiths excel in that area along with customer service. Any time we called them for their services, they came out right away and fixed the issue. Highly recommend.

Robert S.

Very efficient and knowledgeable, highly recommend using The Flying Locksmith.

Dan H.

Always great service and very friendly staff. Thank you for your service. Erich Henze facility manager at Lochmoor Club

Erich H.

Everyone at the Flying Locksmith is fantastic! The crew was very professional and they have always responded very quickly to any issues with our controlled access system. I highly recommend this company and wouldn't hesitate to call upon them again for future needs.

Jeanine O.

Meet Our Team

Watch a quick video of Buzz, our mascot, and meet our commercial locksmiths and access control security specialists.

The Leading Locksmith, Access Control and Security Systems Installer Near Detroit

We're securing Detroit's business community one door at a time

Physical Security, Access Control, and Door Security Systems are terms that mean something different to everyone‚Äîbut to us, especially as a Detroit locksmith, it‚Äôs all about knowing you‚Äôre able to manage access and secure your building properly and efficiently, every day. In Detroit, Michigan, where the dynamics of urban security are ever-evolving, having a reliable access control locksmith to handle your needs is crucial. Use Detroit‚Äôs top locksmith service and access control specialists to secure your property.

Our door access and locksmith services extend throughout Detroit and into the surrounding county, ensuring that whether you're in the heart of the city or in a nearby area, you have access to the best security solutions. Michigan businesses often require robust security systems that incorporate high-grade safes and complex key management‚Äîservices that our Detroit locksmith team provides with unmatched expertise.

We understand that keys are the backbone of physical security, and our services are designed to manage them from creation to replacement efficiently. Whether you need duplicate keys, new keys after a security breach, or electronic keys for advanced access control locking systems, our locksmiths in Detroit are equipped to assist. The safety of your Michigan business hinges not just on the locks themselves but on the integrity and management of the keys that operate them.

Furthermore, as the premier county locksmith, we specialize in tailoring services to fit the unique needs of each client, ensuring each security solution from safes to key systems is implemented seamlessly and securely. Trust our team to provide the door access and locksmith services necessary to keep your Detroit area business safe and easily accessible.

Remember, every day brings new security challenges, but with our Detroit locksmith team by your side, managing those challenges becomes easier. We offer a comprehensive range of services, from installing state-of-the-art safes to crafting master key systems that enhance the accessibility and security of your Michigan premises. If you're in Detroit or any part of the county, rely on us for top-notch locksmith services and access control systems that keep your business locked tight and your keys in reliable hands.

Door Access Services Provided by Detroit's Top Business Security Company

Access control installation near me

AUTOMATIC DOOR OPERATORS

When your automatic and handicap doors aren‚Äôt functioning properly, give us a call. We‚Äôre AAADM certified nationwide to install new automatic door operators, along with automatic door inspection and maintenance.

BUILDING INTERCOM SYSTEMS

We most often install Building Intercom Systems for multifamily buildings, small businesses, schools and government facilities. ButterflyMX, LiftMaster and Aiphone are among our favorite solutions for commercial intercoms.

COMMERCIAL DOOR INSTALLATION

Doors are the first things your customers see and touch at your business, which is why it's crucial to make a great first impression. Commercial door repair and installation near me? Check.

SECURITY CAMERA SYSTEMS

We supply high tech cctv and security cameras, along with system design and installation of commercial security camera systems across the country. We won‚Äôt miss a beat‚Äîso you don‚Äôt miss a thing.

MULTI-SITE BUSINESS SECURITY

As physical security contractors, we‚Äôre at our best when you have unique business security problems that need solving. Sometimes that means making the impossible, possible.

Locksmith Services Offered in Detroit, Michigan

Commercial locksmith near me

EXIT DEVICE INSTALLATION

Exit devices, crash bars or panic devices; we install them, and can also repair existing exit device hardware or retrofit for access control usage.

Exit Devices & Crash Bars

ELECTRIC STRIKE INSTALLATION

Take the guess work out of electric strike installation. We supply, cut-in and run wire for every electric strike on the market.

Electric Strike Installation

SMART LOCK INSTALLATION

With our smart lock installation service, access control is simple, making it one of the most cost-effective access-types on the planet.

Smart Lock Installation

RFID DOOR LOCKS

We install RFID door locks every day. Letting the right person in at the right time has never been more cost-effective with zero wire options.

RFID Door Locks

HIGH SECURITY LOCKS

We specialize in high security locks and keys which cannot be picked or duplicated. Brands like Medeco and Primus are indispensable to keeping your business secure.

High Security Keys & Locks

Need help with a product or service?

Locksmith Careers in Detroit

Be the largest part of the engine that helps make the world safer one door at a time!

Requirements:

Ability to perform standard emergency work orders, for commercial clients only

Ability to install, repair and maintain Commercial and Residential hardware

Safe and Card Access experience is a Huge Plus

Ability to install, repair and maintain panic hardware and exit devices

Ability to modify hardware for locks

Ability to create and maintain master key systems

Residential & Commercial Lock re-keying/ Perform Pining of locks

Ability to interpret a variety of instructions in written, diagram or schedule form

Ability to trouble-shoot with a variety of variables in situations

Ability to clean, maintain, adjust, calibrate & service equipment used

Ability to read operating and maintenance instructions, and procedure manuals

Ability to write simple correspondence

Ability to effectively present information to customers & commercial clients

Ability to add, subtract, multiply, and divide in all units of measure

Ability to cut keys by code

Automatic door experience a big plus

Operations Support:

Receive verbal instructions from Management or Clients/Customers.

Perform small projects as directed by Management.

Complete and submit paperwork accurately and on time.

Physical Requirements:

Must be able to fluently understand, speak and write English

Ability to push, pull and lift at least 50lbs

Ability to kneel, crouch and stoop

Ability to reach above and below the shoulders

Ability to use hands and fingers to grasp, twist, and pull

Ability to climb a ladder and work above ground

Withstand external weather conditions year round

Subject to a criminal background check and a review of driving record.

We offer Great benefits including: Work Van that can be used to travel to and from work, Gas, iPhone, Tools, Uniforms, Competitive Salary and vacation time. We also offer additional overtime for emergency service work.

Work with business professionals, who will treat you with courtesy and respect, while you work side by side to deliver quality service.

Required experience:

You Must have at least 3 years of security system experience to be considered.

Submit Your Resume For Locksmith Technician

Requirements:

Inspects all basic and complex commercial and residential access and video systems. Inspects the quality of work performed by others to ensure it meets company standards.

Installs and services basic, integrated and complex commercial and residential access and video systems according to system specifications.

Performs advanced, complex troubleshooting and repair functions for commercial and residential access and video systems such as: programming; cleaning detectors; testing controls and peripheral devices; mounting, replacing and testing equipment according to specifications; running cable, etc.

Be a ‚Äúgo-to‚Äù resource for colleagues as a primary daily responsibility.

Instructs customers in access and video systems operation.

Responds to customer questions and requests.

Recommend corrective services to adjust customer complaints.

Diffuses difficult and complex customer issues.

Builds and maintains working relations with the sales staff.

Defines the scope of add-ons and change orders, seeks customer approval and writes up paperwork.

Recommends ways to use additional features and capabilities of system installations.

Performs site visits with sales consultants at existing or potential clients.

Takes responsibility for project from first walk through to final sign off and hand offs to service.

Maintains accurate records of all inspections/service calls and troubleshooting as required.

Provides accurate, detailed and timely paperwork and reports to management.

Acts as onsite project lead to meet project timelines and goals, and oversee lead technicians, technicians, apprentices, and subcontractors.

Evaluates new products for reliability and fitness to targeted customer use and profile.

Other duties as required by management.

Experience with systems mentioned below is useful but not all required.

Access Control‚Äì Avigilon ACM, Linear Emerge3 &50P, S2, Lenel Kantech, Honeywell WinPak, DSX, Maxxess Access, AMAG Symetry, Keyscan System7, Brivo, OpenPath

Credentials and Biometics‚Äì HID, Aptiq, AWID, Suprema, BioConnect, MyIris, IrisID, LG Iris, Schlage, L1 Indenity, NEDAP, TRES443/900 Long Range Readers, Object Detection

CCTV‚Äì Exacq, Avigilon , Axis, Arecont, ACTi, Pelco, HikVision, Dahua, LPR

Lock Hardware‚Äì HES, Rutherford, Schlage, Allegion Brands, Assa Brands, SDC Controls, Lock Retrofit Kits, Magnetic Locks, Electrified Trim Sets, Electified Crash Bars, Electified Strikes, Electrified Handsets, Schlage NDE

Networks‚Äì Netgear, Dlink , Ubiquit, Fiber Optics, SPF Modules, Fiber Optic Testing and Termination

Wireless‚Äì Ubiquiti, Firetide, Fluid Mesh

Customer Service:

Provide a high level of timely & accurate customer service.

Communicates effectively with the client to determine what services are needed.

Respond to general inquiries from customers/clients.

Operations Support:

Receive verbal instructions from Management or Clients/Customers.

Perform small projects as directed by Management.

Complete and submit paperwork accurately and on time.

Physical Requirements:

Must be able to fluently understand, speak and write English

Ability to push, pull and lift at least 50lbs

Ability to kneel, crouch and stoop

Ability to reach above and below the shoulders

Ability to use hands and fingers to grasp, twist, and pull

Ability to climb a ladder and work above ground

Withstand external weather conditions year round

Subject to a criminal background check and a review of driving record.

We offer Great benefits including: Work Van that can be used to travel to and from work, Gas, iPhone, Tools, Uniforms, Competitive Salary and vacation time. We also offer additional overtime for emergency service work.

Work with business professionals, who will treat you with courtesy and respect, while you work side by side to deliver quality service.

Required experience:

You Must have at least 3 years of security system experience to be considered.

PS ‚Äì We‚Äôre Local ‚Äì Nationwide!

Technology and innovation flows through our veins not just because we‚Äôre a family business that's locally owned and operated, but because we‚Äôre a national access control company, too. FlyLock Security Solutions of Detroit is part of the largest connected network of commercial locksmiths and door access security system providers in the United States. As a leading commercial locksmith and access control company in Detroit, we've got you covered with everything from commercial doors and access control systems, to cctv security cameras and integrated commercial security solutions, to building intercoms and automatic door operators, and pretty much all locksmith services in between.
